explanation: [0-0] A police officer in a black uniform appears in the frame, walking down a prison corridor. The walls of the corridor are gray, the floor is also gray, and there is a yellow stripe on the wall. There is a man in black in the upper left corner of the screen.

[0-6] The policeman continues walking for a while, then stops, takes out a pair of white checkered shorts, and turns to face the cell. A prisoner in an orange jumpsuit and glasses appears in the cell. The prisoner laughs at the pants in the policeman’s hand, and then the policeman eats the pants. The surprised prisoner walks to the cell door and stares with wide eyes.

The policeman looks suspiciously into another room where there is a prisoner also wearing an orange jumpsuit, but he is wearing pixelated sunglasses and has a beard. After the prisoner takes the button, the policeman continues walking forward.
